entities

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
      • entities.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DumbTargeter, SmartTargeter, StraightLineEnemy, WallFollower

    public abstract class Enemy
extends Entity
    An Enemy is a player-hostile entity that moves according to an algorithm based on the environment

    • Method Detail

      • playerCheck

        public boolean playerCheck(PlayerController playerCon)
        Checks to see if the enemy has collided with the player
        Parameters:
        playerCon - The playerController needed to check if the enemy is in contact with the player
        Returns:
        A boolean value, true if the player is in contact with the current enemy.

      • algorithm

        public abstract void algorithm(MapController map,
                               EntityController ec)
        Provides the next move based on the current map state
        Parameters:
        map - The current map state
        ec - The entityController primarily used for checking if items are in the enemies way.

      • export

        public abstract java.lang.String export()
        Export method to create a definition of the current enemy.
        Returns:
        A string form of the Enemy with all the specific details needed to recreate.
